    • serveMarketClient

      public int serveMarketClient​(String name, int stock)
      Serves a Market's firts client.
      Specified by:
      serveMarketClient in interface IManageMarkets
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the market
      stock - the served stock
      Returns:
      the stock left to serve, -1 if the market doesn't exist
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the name is null or blank
      IllegalArgumentException - if the stock is less or equal than zero
      IllegalStateException - if there are no markets
      IllegalStateException - if there are no clients on the market
